description: A Golang based exporter captures druid API metrics as well as JSON emitted metrics and converts them into Prometheus time-series format.

panels.description: Seconds taken to complete a query
panels.title: Query Time @Broker (datasource)

panels.description: How often you hit the cache when issuing a query and you don't need to scan from disk
panels.title: Query Cache Hit Rate Total

panels.description: Time taken to query individual segment or hit the cache (per instance). The Rate is per hour (*3600)
panels.title: Druid Query SegmentCache Time Sum Rate (per minute)

panels.description: Rate of queries interrupted due to cancellation or timeout compared to total queries (per minute)
panels.title: Druid Interrupted Query Rate (per minute)

panels.description: Rate (3m) of time that took to execute query (per datasource)
panels.title: Druid Query Time Rate (datasource) [data-team]

panels.description: Rate (3m) of time that took to execute query (per datasource)
panels.title: Druid Query Time Rate (datasource/instance) [devops]
Successful Task Rate Increase (per minute) (per DS)

panels.description: Monitor spikes in task failure creation. Rate of 1 means that counter increased by 1 unit on average per minute, since it's multiplied by 60. Rate of 0 means that counter is not increasing during the observed time window
panels.title: Failed Task Increase Rate (per minute) (per DS)

panels.description: We multiply by 60 we get the per minute increase rate of tasks. Increase rate of 1 means that there is 1 task added every minute
panels.title: Total task increase Rate per minute (per DS)
Average Task Run Time Duration over time

title: Druid / Druid Overview
